data_description.confirmation_timeout: Maximum seconds to wait for confirmed price before using estimates. Set to 0 to wait indefinitely.
data_description.demand_window_price: Price to add to general channel during demand windows. Set high (e.g. $50) to prevent imports during demand periods.
data_description.enable_websocket: Enable WebSocket for real-time price updates (alpha feature)
data_description.forecast_intervals: How many future intervals to request from the Amber API (maps to the `next` parameter). Range: 1 to 2048. Availability may be capped by the API.
data_description.pricing_mode: AEMO is Amber's displayed price (per_kwh). APP uses Amber's predicted price (advanced_price_predicted).
